title: Office Worker
description: A person wearing business attire. This may include items such as a shirt, tie, jacket, or headset.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's office worker emoji presents a professional figure with a clean, modern aesthetic, characterized by Apple's hallmark smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. The subtle 3D shading gives the individual a friendly and approachable demeanor, often depicted in business attire. On Apple devices, this emoji is a straightforward symbol for work, professionalism, or the daily grind, perfect for discussions related to careers or business matters.
